kpi.name: M1006C121

kpi_info.title: ACTIVE SET UPDATE RL ADD ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted radio link additions with an active set update procedure. When an RRC: ACTIVE SET UPDATE message is sent by the serving RNC to the UE for adding one or more radio links to the active set. The counter is updated by the number of radio links that are attempted to add into the active set, also in a cell replacement procedure.The counter is updated for the cells tried to be added to the active set. In case of DRNC cell, object WBTS-0/WCEL-0 is used.

kpi.kpi_alias: ACTIVE SET UPDATE RL ADD ATTEMPTS
